cbinstall.name: CB Auto Actions
cbinstall.author: Krileon
cbinstall.copyright: (C) 2004-2015 www.joomlapolis.com / Lightning MultiCom SA - and its licensors, all rights reserved
cbinstall.description: Perform actions at various Community Builder triggers.

param.name: internal_general_url
param.label: Internal General URL
param.description: Your site unique URL that can be used in HTTP requests, accessed directly, or in CRON to execute Internal General actions.

param.name: internal_users_url
param.label: Internal Users URL
param.description: Your site unique URL that can be used in HTTP requests, accessed directly, or in CRON to execute Internal Users actions on every CB user. To execute on a specific user or set of users include the users parameter as a comma separated list of user ids in the URL (e.g. users=62,38,43,29).

param.name: exclude
param.label: Exclude
param.description: Input comma seperated list of user ids to be excluded from all auto actions (e.g. 62,39,21,8).

field.name: description
field.value: Automatically logs in a user after registration or confirmation (must be approved and confirmed).

field.name: description
field.value: Logs activity when a user logs in.

field.name: description
field.value: Logs activity when a user logs out.

field.name: description
field.value: Logs activity when a new user registers.

field.name: description
field.value: Logs activity when a new connection is added.

field.name: description
field.value: Logs activity when a new cross (both directions) connection is added.

field.name: params
field.value: {"activity":[{"mode":"activity","method":"create","stream":"activity","source":"","type":"gallery","subtype":"[var1_type]","title":"uploaded a [cb:if var1_type=\"photos\"]photo[\/cb:if][cb:if var1_type=\"videos\"]video[\/cb:if][cb:if var1_type=\"files\"]file[\/cb:if][cb:if var1_type=\"music\"]music[\/cb:if]","message":"","item":"[var1_id]","parent":"","owner":"[var1_user_id]","action":{"id":"","message":"","emote":""},"links":[{"type":"[cb:if var1_type=\"photos\"]image[\/cb:if][cb:if var1_type=\"videos\"]video[\/cb:if][cb:if var1_type=\"files\"]url[\/cb:if][cb:if var1_type=\"music\"]audio[\/cb:if]","url":"[cb:config param=\"live_site\" \/]\/index.php?option=com_comprofiler&view=pluginclass&plugin=cbgallery&action=items&func=show&type=photos&id=[var1_id]","text":"[var1_file]","title":"[var1_title]","description":"[cb:if var1_type!=\"files\"][var1_description][\/cb:if][cb:if var1_type=\"files\"]<div>[var1_description]<\/div><div class=\"small text-muted\" style=\"margin-top: 5px;\">[cb:parse function=\"getFileName\" class=\"var1\" \/] | [cb:parse function=\"getFileSize\" class=\"var1\" \/] | [cb:parse function=\"getExtension\" class=\"var1\" \/]<\/div>[\/cb:if]","thumbnail":"1","internal":"1","media":{"url":"[cb:if var1_type!=\"files\"][cb:config param=\"live_site\" \/]\/index.php?option=com_comprofiler&view=pluginclass&plugin=cbgallery&action=items&func=preview&type=photos&id=[var1_id]&format=raw[\/cb:if]","mimetype":"[cb:parse function=\"getMimeType\" class=\"var1\" \/]","extension":"[cb:parse function=\"getExtension\" class=\"var1\" \/]"}}],"comments":"0","replies":"0","direction":"0","paging":"1","limit":"30","output":"echo"}],"reload":"0","exclude":"","format":"1","references":"","debug":"0"}
